aboutText:
Assistant Manager - Finance, currently handling the entire gamut of financial and project management for IBI Group (an international planning, design, and consulting firm). Over 10 years of experience in Finance, Business Partnering, MIS Reporting, Cost Management, Project Costing, Budgeting, Variance Analysis, and Financial Reporting.
Specialties include assisting in process optimization, driving cost efficiencies, developing financial models, and ensuring that all project activities are completed in line with financial targets. Passionate about providing strategic financial support to teams across all business units.

experienceData.title: Assistant Manager - Finance
experienceData.description:
- End-to-End finance for multiple projects
- Preparation of financial reports for internal & external stakeholders
- Project Budgeting and Cost Control
- Project-specific financial performance tracking

educationData.school: Institute of Chartered Financial Analysts of India (ICFAI)
